verses.verse: Then came<WH935> certain<WH376> of the elders<WH4480> <WH2205> of Israel<WH3478> unto<WH413> me, and sat<WH3427> before<WH6440> me.
And the word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> unto<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> these<WH428> men<WH376> have set up<WH5927> their idols<WH1544> in<WH5921> their heart,<WH3820> and put<WH5414> the stumblingblock<WH4383> of their iniquity<WH5771> before<WH5227> their face:<WH6440> should I be inquired of at all<WH1875> <WH1875> by them?

Therefore <WH3651> speak<WH1696> unto them, and say<WH559> unto<WH413> them, Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Every man<WH376> <WH376> of the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> that<WH834> setteth up<WH5927> <WH853> his idols<WH1544> in<WH413> his heart,<WH3820> and putteth<WH7760> the stumblingblock<WH4383> of his iniquity<WH5771> before<WH5227> his face,<WH6440> and cometh<WH935> to<WH413> the prophet;<WH5030> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> will answer<WH6030> him that cometh<WH935> according to the multitude<WH7230> of his idols;<WH1544>

That <WH4616> I may take<WH8610> <WH853> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> in their own heart,<WH3820> because<WH834> they are all<WH3605> estranged<WH2114> from<WH4480> <WH5921> me through their idols.<WH1544>

Therefore <WH3651> say<WH559> unto<WH413> the house<WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> Thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> Repent,<WH7725> and turn<WH7725> yourselves from<WH4480> <WH5921> your idols;<WH1544> and turn away<WH7725> your faces<WH6440> from<WH4480> <WH5921> all<WH3605> your abominations.<WH8441>

For <WH3588> every one<WH376> <WH376> of the house<WH4480> <WH1004> of Israel,<WH3478> or of the stranger<WH4480> <WH1616> that<WH834> sojourneth<WH1481> in Israel,<WH3478> which separateth himself<WH5144> from<WH4480> <WH310> me, and setteth up<WH5927> his idols<WH1544> in<WH413> his heart,<WH3820> and putteth<WH7760> the stumblingblock<WH4383> of his iniquity<WH5771> before<WH5227> his face,<WH6440> and cometh<WH935> to<WH413> a prophet<WH5030> to inquire<WH1875> of him concerning me; I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> will answer<WH6030> him by myself:

And I will set<WH5414> my face<WH6440> against that<WH1931> man,<WH376> and will make<WH7760> him a sign<WH226> and a proverb,<WH4912> and I will cut him off<WH3772> from the midst<WH4480> <WH8432> of my people;<WH5971> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I<WH589> am the LORD.<WH3068>

And if<WH3588> the prophet<WH5030> be deceived<WH6601> when he hath spoken<WH1696> a thing,<WH1697> I<WH589> the LORD<WH3068> have deceived<WH6601> <WH853> that<WH1931> prophet,<WH5030> and I will stretch out<WH5186> <WH853> my hand<WH3027> upon<WH5921> him, and will destroy<WH8045> him from the midst<WH4480> <WH8432> of my people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478>

And they shall bear<WH5375> the punishment of their iniquity:<WH5771> the punishment<WH5771> of the prophet<WH5030> shall be<WH1961> even as the punishment<WH5771> of him that seeketh<WH1875> unto him;

That <WH4616> the house<WH1004> of Israel<WH3478> may go no<WH3808> more<WH5750> astray<WH8582> from<WH4480> <WH310> me, neither<WH3808> be polluted<WH2930> any more<WH5750> with all<WH3605> their transgressions;<WH6588> but that they may be<WH1961> my people,<WH5971> and I<WH589> may be<WH1961> their God,<WH430> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
The word<WH1697> of the LORD<WH3068> came<WH1961> again to<WH413> me, saying,<WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man,<WH120> when<WH3588> the land<WH776> sinneth<WH2398> against me by trespassing<WH4603> grievously,<WH4604> then will I stretch out<WH5186> mine hand<WH3027> upon<WH5921> it, and will break<WH7665> the staff<WH4294> of the bread<WH3899> thereof, and will send<WH7971> famine<WH7458> upon it, and will cut off<WH3772> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> from<WH4480> it:

Though these<WH428> three<WH7969> men,<WH376> Noah,<WH5146> Daniel,<WH1840> and Job,<WH347> were<WH1961> in<WH8432> it, they<WH1992> should deliver<WH5337> but their own souls<WH5315> by their righteousness,<WH6666> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>

If <WH3863> I cause noisome<WH7451> beasts<WH2416> to pass<WH5674> through the land,<WH776> and they spoil<WH7921> it, so that it be<WH1961> desolate,<WH8077> that no man<WH4480> <WH1097> may pass through<WH5674> because<WH4480> <WH6440> of the beasts: <WH2416>

Though these<WH428> three<WH7969> men<WH376> were in<WH8432> it, as I<WH589> live,<WH2416> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> they<WH1992> shall deliver<WH5337> neither<WH518> sons<WH1121> nor<WH518> daughters;<WH1323> they only<WH905> shall be delivered,<WH5337> but the land<WH776> shall be<WH1961> desolate.<WH8077>

Or <WH176> if I bring<WH935> a sword<WH2719> upon<WH5921> that<WH1931> land,<WH776> and say,<WH559> Sword,<WH2719> go<WH5674> through the land;<WH776> so that I cut off<WH3772> man<WH120> and beast<WH929> from<WH4480> it:

Though these<WH428> three<WH7969> men<WH376> were in<WH8432> it, as I<WH589> live,<WH2416> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> they shall deliver<WH5337> neither<WH3808> sons<WH1121> nor daughters,<WH1323> but<WH3588> they<WH1992> only<WH905> shall be delivered themselves.<WH5337>

Or <WH176> if I send<WH7971> a pestilence<WH1698> into<WH413> that<WH1931> land,<WH776> and pour out<WH8210> my fury<WH2534> upon<WH5921> it in blood,<WH1818> to cut off<WH3772> from<WH4480> it man<WH120> and beast: <WH929>

Though Noah,<WH5146> Daniel,<WH1840> and Job,<WH347> were in<WH8432> it, as I<WH589> live,<WH2416> saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD,<WH3069> they<WH1992> shall deliver<WH5337> neither<WH518> son<WH1121> nor<WH518> daughter;<WH1323> they shall but deliver<WH5337> their own souls<WH5315> by their righteousness.<WH6666>

For <WH3588> thus<WH3541> saith<WH559> the Lord<WH136> GOD;<WH3069> How much more<WH637> when<WH3588> I send<WH7971> my four<WH702> sore<WH7451> judgments<WH8201> upon<WH413> Jerusalem,<WH3389> the sword,<WH2719> and the famine,<WH7458> and the noisome<WH7451> beast,<WH2416> and the pestilence,<WH1698> to cut off<WH3772> from<WH4480> it man<WH120> and beast?<WH929>

Yet, behold,<WH2009> therein shall be left<WH3498> a remnant<WH6413> that shall be brought forth,<WH3318> both sons<WH1121> and daughters:<WH1323> behold,<WH2009> they shall come forth<WH3318> unto<WH413> you, and ye shall see<WH7200> <WH853> their way<WH1870> and their doings:<WH5949> and ye shall be comforted<WH5162> concerning<WH5921> the evil<WH7451> that<WH834> I have brought<WH935> upon<WH5921> Jerusalem,<WH3389> even concerning<WH854> all<WH3605> that<WH834> I have brought<WH935> upon<WH5921> it.

And they shall comfort<WH5162> you, when<WH3588> ye see<WH7200> <WH853> their ways<WH1870> and their doings:<WH5949> and ye shall know<WH3045> that<WH3588> I have not<WH3808> done<WH6213> without cause<WH2600> <WH853> all<WH3605> that<WH834> I have done<WH6213> in it, saith<WH5002> the Lord<WH136> GOD.<WH3069>
